title: Say What? ‘I’ll Never Buy Life Insurance Because...’
text:
Say What is an occasional feature in which a financial adviser shares a statement he or she heard from a client that is unforgettable for its wisdom or its wackiness or another reason.
The adviser:
Christopher Van Slyke, partner, WorthPointe Wealth Management, Austin, Texas
The statement:
“I’ll never buy life insurance because I’m going to divorce my wife.”
This was said by a Beverly Hills millionaire, after his wife left to go to the bathroom during the couple’s first meeting with Mr. Van Slyke.
